t: Amazon launches own pet product brand Wag | The Seattle Times
s: May 3, 2018 - The Wag brand launched Wednesday with dry dog food, and Amazon plans to expand the selection to include other pet supplies.

t: Amazon launches Wag, its own line of pet products - CNET
s: May 3, 2018 - Wag, Amazon's new pet products brand. Amazon · Amazon on Wednesday launched its own brand of pet products, called Wag, adding to the internet retailer's expansive list of private-label brands, which has grown to include diapers, clothing and even mid-century furniture.

t: Pets | Amazon Seller Solutions
s: October 31, 2023 - Amazon is a powerful platform that can help pet brands to reach a wide audience of potential customers.
